name: epigraphist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who specializes in epigraphy (= the study of words that are written on or cut into a hard material such as clay or stone): The inscriptions have been meticulously described by a well known epigraphist. As a skilled epigraphist, he reconstructed the history of the region through a study of inscriptions. Related word
epigraphy
More examplesFewer examplesThe epigraphist made his name translating rock graffiti in the area. Epigraphists discovered an important inscription on a tomb wall.She is a senior epigraphist in the department of archaeology at the university.His work as an epigraphist and his work as a historian were linked.
